roleset.name: to damage, disfigure
roleset.note: MUTILATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mutilate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from mutilate.01-v predicate notes)
MUTILATED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from mutilated.01-j)

example.name: passive
example.text: The U.S. Mint would n't take the coin because it-1 was n't mutilated *trace*-1, and the Federal Reserve Bank accepts only clean coins , he says [0] [*T*-1].
